'''Quarno''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|Quarno leans against the wall of the bath and regards you skeptically. He wrinkles his nose and grimaces. The golden torc around his neck and gemstones in his ears glimmer in the low light.}}
He is an agent of the [RDC](/royalDeadfireCompany/) with a particularly treacherous skillset. Quarno is commonly considered to be a snake just accidentally wearing the guise of a man.

## Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved = [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/): His meeting with a Principi agent is what Castol wants to know about.
